column2: On September 29, 2020, estimates for category “Milk sold off farms, total in July 2020 were corrected for Newfoundland and Labrador."
For explanation of changes in methodology contact Dairy/Food Unit, Agriculture Division, Statistics Canada.
Data for total milk production, farm home consumed and fed to livestock not available after 1978.
